In Industrial settings, Maintenance Personnel performing Setup or Programming tasks may encounter Cavitation Phenomena, which can lead to Low-back morbidity. These tasks are classified as frequent-to-continuous and/or exposure time is long, with a possibility described as possible under specific conditions. The severity of potential injuries is described as slight (normally reversible injury).
